description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dbtf2","text":"This is the protocol for the transformation of conidia by Agrobacterium to perform the BarSeq technique in Trichoderma atroviride, which is reported by Villalobos-Escobedo et al., 2023.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_equipments.name: Thermo Scientific™ Nalgene™ Rapid-Flow™ Sterile Disposable Bottle Top Filters with PES Membrane
HAWP MF-Millipore Membrane Filter, 0.45 µm pore size

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0qtq","text":"Prepare:  1 mL 3,5-dimethoxy-4-hydroxy-acetophenone (acetosyringone) dissolved in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO).  (make this fresh every time)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":69,"length":38},{"style":"bold","offset":109,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qjt7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cavk2","text":"-- Acetosyringone is filtered through syringe and 0.22 um filter top in DMSO (0.098 g/ mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"861g0","text":"Autoclave 437ml ddH2O with 20g Bacto Agar","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgjfo","text":"Add MIXED induction liquid to agar.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cjop","text":"Mix together inside hood for a few minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rh93","text":"Pour plates.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amn9r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvhvn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgf1i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f73g7","text":"Pour solid agro induction media plates and leave on bench to dry for 2 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btu5p","text":"Measure the OD600 of the agro cell culture. (It will likely be around OD600 1.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"i40n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"836rv","text":"(Around 9 am )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bv95o","text":"Prepare medium for Agrobacterium LB + Kan.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6h0c5","text":"Inoculate A. tumefaciens strain harboring the plasmid for Trichoderma transformation onto LB + Kan.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":99,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2b4eo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"3E77B7F050C711EC99DFF17C083FEBDA","id":0,"label":"in 50 mL","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29f2e","text":"Shake at 250rpm at 30C overnight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vufi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dabe","text":"(Place around 7 pm- 8 pm)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bto2s","text":"Back dilute the agro culture to OD600 0.5 in LB+Kan with twice the number of ml of media to the number of transformations you plan to do (i.e., if you are doing 100 transformations back dilute into 200ml LB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rk8m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q5sh","text":"100 mL from stock and 100 mL new LB+Kan","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9phmf","text":"In order to get an accurate measurement, dilute the sample 1:10 in H2O in the cuvette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c28ge","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4urjq","text":"(100 uL agro cell culture, 900 uL H2O)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eeepi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8oo8c","text":"Shake at 250rpm at 30C for 2h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c4afi","text":"Measure the OD600 of the agro cell culture after 2 hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9e2be","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"746a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bnqq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2hpes","text":"It should be around OD600 1. If it is not at least OD600 0.95, put it back on the 30C shaker for another 30min.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42j7b","text":"Centrifuge the agro culture at . {"blocks":[{"key":"bakcs","text":"Wash cells in agro induction media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7avd1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eqfe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d4t2t","text":"The number of mL should correspond to twice the number of transformations that you are doing","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f8p08","text":"ex: 20 ml for 10 transformations","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d1frd","text":"New flasks are used ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2c3u","text":"Centrifuge the agro cells at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"favf2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":900,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"02C02C4050C911EC99DFF17C083FEBDA","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5d0r","text":"Resuspend cells in agro induction media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7drs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rb5g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fk4da","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ti8i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"v7id","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5i69a","text":"The number of mL should correspond to twice the number of transformations that you are doing","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ce774","text":"For 100 transformations 200 ml of induction media, and each transformation has 4*10^7 conidia,","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":42,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"aaq26","text":"it's 2*10^7 per ml. Concentration of agro.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":38,"offset":0,"style":"bold"},{"length":38,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"6efsl","text":"We can use tubes with caps for roller.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d16gr","text":"Put cultures on shaker @ 25C and rpm 250, for 24 hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m0eu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77jtj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej63p","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fao5v","text":"Approximately 23h after putting agro cells into induction media, collect Trichoderma conidia from plates into 5-10ml of H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":73,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"67oa7","text":" (using plates of T. atroviride that are 4 days old)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"euu3c","text":"NOTE: Make sure the big square plates are at room temperature.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eni8q","text":"Shake and vortex vigorously to suspend conidia","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cp1ra","text":"Measure conidial concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjqf1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8uji6","text":"Count four corner squares, and middle square","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ojl","text":"Avg spores:  Sum of both sides / 10 squares\nMath: (Avg. spores)(1x10^4)(25)(100)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"en4gh","text":"Aliquot 2e7 conidia into 2ml Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2e17d","text":"Spin cells at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ooec","text":"or 4000 rpm for 20 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"125E35F050CB11EC99DFF17C083FEBDA","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dl7b0","text":"Pipet off supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aonet","text":"Resuspend cells (pellet) in 2ml of agro induction media cell culture (from yesterday)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60qcf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ejgdd","text":"Incubate at room temperature for at least 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
